title: Should you buy your grandma a robot?
description:
From the Recode Daily archives (Sept. 21, 2020) :The pandemic has made robot caregivers a popular way to keep elderly people company. But as Vox's Sigal Samuel explains, they're not for everyone.
Read Sigal's story here.
